sentences.en: And what about the Dallas Mavericks and Dirk Nowitzki?
sentences.cn: 那达拉斯小牛队和诺维斯基 呢 ?

sentences.en: As soon as they were safely back to shore, Dirk raced for the nearest phone.
sentences.cn: 他们一安全抵岸，德克就飞快地奔向最近的电话。

sentences.en: Dirk Enke tr ? gt ein schwarzes Polohemd, eine schwarze Jeans und schwarze Lederschuhe.
sentences.cn: 在写字台上有台开着的笔记本电脑, 在它前面是一张哀悼的卡片.

sentences.en: Dirk Nowitzki went up for the rebound as well , but never saw me.
sentences.cn: (诺维茨基也跳起抢那球, 根本不知道我冲过来. )

sentences.en: Dirk's surly exterior concealed a warm and generous nature.
sentences.cn: 德克粗鲁乖戾的外表之下隐藏着一种热情、慷慨的性格.

sentences.en: Es ist ein schwieriges Gespr? ch f ü r Dirk Enke.
sentences.cn: 对迪尔克? 恩克来说这是个艰难的交谈.

sentences.en: Liverpool have made a new move for Feyenoord striker Dirk Kuyt.
sentences.cn: 利物浦为费耶诺德射手德克-库伊特开出新的报价.

sentences.en: Liverpool star Dirk Kuyt has hailed the impact of team - mate Glen Johnson since his at Anfield.
sentences.cn: 红军球星库伊特赞扬了队友约翰逊来到安菲尔德后给球队带来的冲击力.

sentences.en: Liverpool's latest signing Dirk Kuyt has been handed squad number 18.
sentences.cn: 红军刚签下的库伊特将身穿18号球衣.

sentences.en: Nancy wasn't sure if Dirk was making a pass at her.
sentences.cn: 南希不确定德克是不是在勾引她。

sentences.en: Perhaps Mavs All - Star forward Dirk Nowitzki will be ready by then.
sentences.cn: 也许小牛的全明星前锋诺维斯基将可以在这场比赛中上场.

sentences.en: Sometimes they become stars, like [ Dirk ] Nowitzki , Tony Parker , those kind of guys.
sentences.cn: 他们的大多数是角色球员,但是也有人能成为巨星, 就像 德克·诺维茨基, 托尼·帕克一样. ”

sentences.en: Viewers will remember the dashing hero, Dirk, risking life and limb to rescue Daphne from the dragons.
sentences.cn: 观众不会忘记风度翩翩的男主角德克冒着生命危险把达芙妮从恶龙爪下救出的情形。

sentences.en: When he grew rich , Dirk cast away his old friends.
sentences.cn: 德克发财时, 抛弃了旧友.

sentences.en: You meet a foreign teacher Dirk.
sentences.cn: 你碰见了外籍教师德克.
